div.p: AXIOM is still under active development and has not yet reached version 1.0. However, official 0.9.x releases are available for download as source or binary. For more information, please see Apache Release FAQ
Please select the AXIOM version you want to download. Latest release is 0.95. You can download both the binary distribution and the source distribution.

tr.td:
Source Distribution zip
MD5 PGP
Binary Distribution zip MD5 PGP

div.p: [if-any logo] [end] The currently selected mirror is [preferred]. If you encounter a problem with this mirror, please select another mirror. If all mirrors are failing, there are backup mirrors (at the end of the mirrors list) that should be available.
div.form: Other mirrors: [if-any http][for http] [http][end][end][if-any ftp][for ftp] [ftp][end][end][if-any backup][for backup] [backup] (backup)[end][end]
div.p: You may also consult the complete list of mirrors.

Note: when downloading from a mirror please check the md5sum and verify the OpenPGP compatible signature from the main Apache site. These can be downloaded by following the links above. This KEYS file contains the public keys used for signing release. It is recommended that (when possible) a web of trust is used to confirm the identity of these keys.
